term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - space charge in a semiconductor
term.title: space charge

item.text: At the surface region of a semiconductor the surface excess or deficiency of electrons constitutes a space charge.

sources.item: PAC, 1986, 58, 437. 'Interphases in systems of conducting phases (Recommendations 1985)' on page 443 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198658030437)
